https://tmrev.io/movie/337436-Antigone at the Barbican 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hdnoyNP7zX9kx29HbH9hfFnaI2S.jpg Cameras exclusively capture the Oscar-winning French actress Juliette Binoche playing the title role in Sophocles's tale of family loyalty, courage and tragedy. The Barbican's visionary new English language translation by TS Eliot Prize-winning poet and classicist Anne Carson is directed by renowned Belgian theatre director Ivo van Hove. Antigone at the Barbican
